d4: Reusable d3 Charts

Basic Row Chart

The following demonstrates the most basic example of the row chart. This chart uses the default settings from d4.

JavaScript Code

  var data = [
      { y: '2010', x:-10 },
      { y: '2011', x:20 },
      { y: '2012', x:30 },
      { y: '2013', x:40 },
      { y: '2014', x:50 },
    ];
  var chart = d4.rowChart();
  d3.select('#example')
  .datum(data)
  .call(chart);
